sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="justify-center d-flex mx-auto flex-column">
    <v-btn @click="toggleDrawer">
      HHHHH
    </v-btn>
    <transition
        appear
        name="slide-fade"
        v-on:before-enter="beforeEnter"
        v-on:enter="enter"
        v-on:leave="leave"
        css>
      <v-card v-if="drawer"
              class="elevation-24 rounded-xl presentation-carousel__wrapper">
        <v-carousel
            continuous
            cycle
            interval="5000"
            hide-delimiter-background
            delimiter-icon="mdi-guitar-pick"
            show-arrows-on-hover
            class="rounded-xl presentation-carousel__slider"
        >
          <v-carousel-item
              class="rounded-xl"
              v-for="(slide, i) in slides"
              :key="i"
              :src="slide"
          >
          </v-carousel-item>
        </v-carousel>
      </v-card>
    </transition>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import velocityMixin from "@/mixins/velocityMixin.ts";

export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  data: () => ({
    drawer: true,
        slides: [
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_metallica.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_slipknot.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_lamb_of_god.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel.png")
    ],
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleDrawer: function () { this.drawer = !this.drawer},
  },
  mixins: [velocityMixin]
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
